Summary: At a stop light i saw the object in front of me to the right... high over the Lake. I WILL TAKE A LIE DETECTOR TEST TODAY TO PROVE THIS! I KNOWWWWW WHAT I SAW!!!!!!
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in New Orleans
There were no other sightings in New Orleans on or around November 15th 1995
divs: sighting detailsi was just driving along pontchartrain dr. in slidell, la. heading to the 5 mile bridge. as i stopped at the ref light at the oak harbor entrance, i clearly saw a disc shaped object above & to the front\right of me. it caught my eye when i looked up at the traffic light. i was stunned because i absolutely knew what this was. i've never seen anything like this, and couldn't believe i was seeing this. i felt exhilaration, fear, complete disbelief at what i was looking at with my own eyes. cars behind me started to honk, the traffic light had turned green. so i whipped into the closest parking lot & got out of the car, ran around the side of the building to catch sight of it again, and it was gone. my sister came and picked me up... i was hysterical. i am certain of what i saw!!!!! i never spoke of it before, because people i know who know me, advised me that others wouldn't believe this. i've always kept this memory close & guarded... i do know for sure i saw a ufo. i will take a polygraph. i want to know if there have been sightings anywhere around that area as well. i just haven't known what to do with this information, i pray i can get someone to hear me!! what should i do?
